name: 2025 8th International Conference on Geoinformatics and Data Analysis
content: PUBLICATION: After a careful peer review process, all registered and presented papers will be published as a volume of Springer Book Series: Lecture Notes Data Engineering and Communications Technologies. The book series is abstracted and indexed by SCOPUS, INSPEC, EI Compendex, etc. All books published in the series are submitted for consideration in Web of Science.
organizers: Ecole Centrale de Marseille, Aix Marseille University, France
